body_html:
@EronWright : As you gathered, the use of placeholders doesn't require that the shape be specified, but you're right, we do want that ability.

Feel free to file a new issue for that, though I do plan to have some rudimentary support for a Shape type and setting attributes soon.
body_text:
@EronWright : As you gathered, the use of placeholders doesn't require that the shape be specified, but you're right, we do want that ability.
Feel free to file a new issue for that, though I do plan to have some rudimentary support for a Shape type and setting attributes soon.
body:
@EronWright : As you gathered, the use of placeholders doesn't _require_ that the shape be specified, but you're right, we do want that ability.

Feel free to file a new issue for that, though I do plan to have some rudimentary support for a Shape type and setting attributes soon.
